TopicTitle: What do you think the .21 update trailer is going to be like?

Articles.Content: Exactly what it says on the tin, if there even is a update trailer. I think the trailer will be something like the Kerbals explode the old space center on accident so they build a new and improved one.
about everything this game is about, explosions, jeb xD and boosters

Exactly what it says on the tin, if there even is a update trailer. I think the trailer will be something like the Kerbals explode the old space center on accident so they build a new and improved one.

I like how you think...
Either that or kerbonaut recruit training going very kerbal.

Going with the explosion theme here...

A massive meteor shower is in bound for the Kerbin system (epic music in background, camera wobbling around in dramatic motions). Many of these meteorites hit Mun and wipe out a couple of satellites and rovers, plus scare a couple of Kerbals on the surface. A few meteors head right for KSC, forcing everyone to scramble with their hands in the air, and then the centre is hit. A while later, everyone is poking around the debris field, scratching their heads, some with their head in their hands, but one bright spark thinks of building a new centre.

Time passes, Mun has a lot of new craters, and a new centre emerges. A shiny new rocket peeks out from the VAB, and then lifts off, onwards to a new future, fading out to the KSP logo with the main menu screen music playing in the background.

Or we could do nothing so fancy and just have someone blow up a rocket instead.
my guess is it will be a recruit in an interview to join KSP. that would make the most sense to me
Jeb riding a rocket into the atmo and crashing into the buildings causing a rebuild.
